charges.charge_description: 18:1341, 1342 Mail fraud, use of false &; fictitious names in a mail fraud(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Purs to 18:3663, it is ord that dft shall mk restitution to the fol aggrieved ptys in the fol amts: Ct 1, 9 &; 15 of Dkt #95-649 - $49,618 - IRS, Chief Special Procedures, Collection Div., Rich Davega 300 N., Rm 409, LA, CA 90012; Ct 4 &; 9 o f Dkt #95-649 - $26,375 - State Franchise Tax Board, 11031 Sun Center Dr., G-08, Attn: Frank Franco, Rancho Cordova, CA 95670; Ct 1 of Dkt #95-854 - $237,795 - Defense Finance &; Accounting Svc., DFAS-CO-FDP, P.O. Box 955515, St. L ouis, MO 63195-5515; Ct 1 of Dkt #95-868 - $349,179 - Defense Finance &; Accounting Svc., DFAS-CO-FDP, P.O. Box 955515, St. Louis, MO 63195-5515; $15,444 - Hill Aviation, 19734 Dearborn St., Chatsworth, CA 91311; Ct 1 of Dkt #95-93 3 - $8,000 - DOD (Speed brake) USN. Dft is comm to the cust of the B/P to be imprisoned for 54 mos. This term consist of 24 mos on ea of cts 1, 9 &; 15, as to Dkt #95-649; The term consist of 30 mos on cts 1, 2, 3 &; 4 of Dkt #95-933; Th ese terms are to be svd consec, The term consist of 30 mos on cts 1 &; 2 to Dkt #95-868; The term consist of 30 mos on ct 1 of Dkt #854; &; a term consisting of 8 mos on ct 1 of Dkt #95-932. All of these terms are to run conc. Upn rel fr m impris, dft shall be plc on supv rel for a term of 3 yrs, conc on all cts, under the fol T/C. 1) Dft shall comply w/the rules &; regs of the USPO &; GO 318; 2) If the amt of any mandatory assessment, restitution or fine imposed by this jgm remains un paid at the commencement of the term of community supv, dft shall pay such remainder as dir by the P/O; 3) As dir by the P/O, dft shall provide to the P/O an accurate financial stmt, w/suppt doc, as to all sources &; amts of income &; all expenses of d ft. In addition, dft shall provide fed &; state income tax rtns as req by the P/O; 4) Dft shall not obtain or poss any driver's lic, Social Security, birth cert, passport or any other form of identification w/o the prior approval of the P/O; fur, dft shall not use, for any purpose or in any manner, any name other than his true legal name. Purs to Sect 5E1.2(f) of the Guidelines, all fines are wv, incl the costs of impris &; supv, as it is found that dft does not have the ability to pay. S/A &; #036;600. The Crt dism all rem cts as to dkt #94-649. The Crt recommends to that dft serve out his sent in Boron. Dft was advsd of his Right to App.
